resources.string: /who :- This will show all members in the broadcast.
/add -name- -country code- -phone number- :- This will add the contact into the broadcast.
/feedback -message-:- You can send feedback to our team.
/delete :- This will delete the current broadcast.
/clear :- This will be used to remove all messages on the screen.
/help :- This will list all the commands and their functionality.
/pwb :- This will show the present working broadcast.
